content.subtitle: A. User-Provided Information
details: Name, email address, and other personal identifiers you voluntarily provide.
Messages, queries, and interactions submitted through Project MK.

content.subtitle: B. Automatically Collected Information
details: Usage data, including time spent, interactions, and preferences.
Device and browser information (IP address, operating system, browser type).

content.subtitle: C. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
details: Cookies to improve user experience and provide personalized content.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: Enable conversations, features, and actions within Project MK.
Analyze user interactions to enhance AI responses and features.
Send important updates, newsletters, or alerts.
Prevent unauthorized access and ensure compliance with policies.

sections.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
content: We do not sell or rent your personal information.

content.subtitle: A. Service Providers
content.details: With trusted third-party providers to perform essential services (e.g., cloud hosting).

content.subtitle: B. Compliance with Laws
content.details: If required by law or to protect our legal rights.

content.subtitle: C. With Your Consent
content.details: When you explicitly agree to share information with others.

sections.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
content: Limited access to authorized personnel only.
Regular audits to ensure data security.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights and Choices
content: Request a copy of the data we hold about you.
Request the deletion of your personal data.
Revoke consent for data collection or processing.
Disable cookies or tracking technologies through browser settings.

sections.title: 6. Third-Party Services
content: Project MK may integrate third-party APIs or services. These services are governed by their own privacy policies, and we recommend reviewing them.

sections.title: 7. Children's Privacy
content: Project MK is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children.

sections.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted here with the updated Effective Date.
